short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmarks inactive tabs automatically. Manage tabs, create a reading list and read articles audio player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: lesstabs automatically archives and closes tabs that have been opened for too long and then lists them when you open a new tab.
